name: Ming
description: A young "old physician" born in a family of TCM physicians. She often uses her income to help the needy while she lives a frugal life. Because of this, she despises the rich who squander away their money.

passiveSkill.name: Relief
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Ming is present, every action taken by allied Spirits restores {placeholder} of their max HP. Ming and Guardians receive double healing."}

uniqueSkill.name: Old Physician
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Restores ATK * {placeholder}  HP to all allies. Every ally healed by Ming gains {placeholder} ATK and DEF. The effect lasts the entire battle and cannot stack."}

specialSkill.name: Go Yam
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Deals {placeholder} damage to a column of enemies. Dispels 1 debuff of a random allied Spirit. Chance to use Skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Doctor's Heart
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Restores ATK * {placeholder}  HP to all allies. Every ally healed by Ming gains {placeholder} ATK and DEF. The effect lasts the entire battle and cannot stack.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Ming is present, every action taken by allied Spirits restores {placeholder} of their max HP. Ming and Guardians receive double healing.
templateData.lens6.skill: Deals {placeholder} damage to a column of enemies. Dispels 1 debuff of a random allied Spirit. Chance to use Skill: {placeholder}
